I can guide you through the NUS admission process or any questions relating to NUS which you might have.

patterns: what are the programs that are available at NUS?
what are the prog available at NUS
responses: May I know which faculty are you referring to?

patterns: i am referring to Nus computing
i am referring to Nus com
responses: We offer outstanding degree programs across the field of computing, including Computer Science, Information Systems, Computer Engineering, Business Analytics and Information Security, as well as specializations in emerging areas of importance such as artificial intelligence, fintech, blockchain, analytics and security. For more information, please visit https://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/programmes/ .

responses: We offer outstanding degree programs across the field of computing, including Computer Science, Information Systems, Computer Engineering, Business Analytics and Information Security, as well as specializations in emerging areas of importance such as artificial intelligence, fintech, blockchain, analytics and security. For more information, please visit https://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/programmes/ .

patterns: How is the curriculum for computing like?
How is the curriculum for com like?
What is the curriculum structure in nus computing?
How is the curriculum structure in NUS computing?
What is the curriculum structure in nus comp?
How is the curriculum structure in NUS com?
responses: For a single degree, you will have to complete 160 modular credits (MC) and for a double degree, you will have to complete around 200 MC. The 160 MC is broken down into: 20 MC for University Level Requirements, 72 MC for Core Modules, 24 MC for Elective Modules,12 MC for Dissertation or Industry Internship Programme and the remaining 32MC is for Unrestricted Electives (UE). For poly-intake, 20MC is automatically awarded for UE. For more information, please visit https://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/programmes/ .

patterns: How many MC do I need to do a minor?
Required number of MC for minor?

modular credits required for a minor?
Required number of modular credits for minor?
To take a minor, how many modular credits do I need?
responses: At least 24 modular credit (MC) is required for a Minor programme, of which up to 8MCs can be counted also towards the Faculty/Major/Minor requirements. For more information, please visit https://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/programmes/ug/minor/ .

modular credits required for a major?
Required number of modular credits for major?
To take a major, how many modular credits do I need?
responses: At least 48 modular credit (MC) is required for a Major programme, of which up to 16 MCs can be counted also towards the Faculty/Major/Minor requirements and at least 16 MCs must be at Level 3000.For more information, please visit https://www.comp.nus.edu.sg/programmes/ug/dmajor/ .

How are the gpa in nus categorised?
How are the degree classified in NUS?
responses: The criteria for degree classification is as follows: Honours (Highest Distinction): CAP 4.50 and above Honours (Distinction): CAP 4.00 – 4.49 Honours (Merit): CAP 3.50 – 3.99 Honours: CAP 3.00 – 3.49 Pass: CAP 2.00 – 2.99 For more information, please visit http://www.nus.edu.sg/registrar/academic-information-policies/undergraduate-students/continuation-and-graduation-requirements .

responses: You will have to take a minimum of 18 Modular credits every semester. For more information, please visit http://www.nus.edu.sg/registrar/academic-information-policies/undergraduate-students/continuation-and-graduation-requirements .

patterns: How do i go about SUing?
How do i exercise my SU?
How do i go about S/Uing?
How do i exercise my S/U?
responses: You may exercise S/U option for up to 32 MCs or 20 MCs for Poly intake in the first 2 regular semsters, if not fully utilized, the S/U option can in exercise in subsequent semsters, for up to 12 MCs. For more information, please visit http://www.nus.edu.sg/registrar/academic-information-policies/undergraduate-students/continuation-and-graduation-requirements .
